p: Students are vulnerable to TB; hence, more TB control and preventive efforts should be made to protect students in schools [ 4]. TB prevalence among Chinese students (1520/100,000) is much higher than that (459/100,000) among the general population [ 27]. Chongqing was one of the regions with the highest TB burden among undergraduate students in China [ 28]. Several TB outbreaks among students have been recently reported in Chongqing [ 29â€“ 31]. This study also observed that almost 10% of the patients were students in this region. Previous studies have shown that students in this region have poor knowledge of TB [ 32]. TB programmes in this region need to make more efforts to protect students, particularly those living in school. These efforts include health education and behavioural interventions.
